snippet.title: Conway's Game of Life in Unity3D Entity Component System (ECS)
snippet.description:
Play Conway's Game of Life by typing commands in the Twitch chat: https://www.twitch.tv/bzh314
First prototype of Conway's Game of Life in Unity3D Entity Component System (pure ECS).
You can spot the common patterns: Still Lifes (Blocks, Beehives, Loafs, Boats, Tubs, ...), Oscillators (Blinkers) and Spaceships (Ants aka Gliders).

More:
* Homepage of the Unity3D Entity Component System prototype of Conway's Game of Life: https://bzh314.com/conway_game_of_life_unity3d_ecs/
* Play #TwitchPlaysGameOfLife Now on #Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/bzh314

#Twitch #Unity3D #TwitchPlays #GameDev #IndieGame

Music:
Hexxit DRAVE Symphonie
Johannes Schroll
https://freepd.com
